nodes.title: Greater Efficiencies for Home Gardens Part 3
nodes.description: This class will look at strategies and methods to get maximum efficiencies of space, yield and labor from home gardens. It will include plans to help you know what your annual results, costs and rewards will be before you event start.

nodes.title: The Parable of the Flower Part 3
nodes.description: The objective of this class is to equip you with details on how you can successfully grow flowers in early spring, summer and fall. Michelle will be sharing her favorite flower varieties and other tips she has learned through her farming experience. Whether you are just starting out with growing flowers or you have gown them for years, you will enjoy this class full of so much lover for flowers.

nodes.title: Introduction to Backyard Beekeeping Part 3
nodes.description: These presentation will help you become familiar with a valuable natural farming resource known as the Honey Bee. Learn how to get started, what to expect, and how to help our friends, and bees!

nodes.title: 13-Adventist Identity
nodes.description: How is the Adventist church rooted in Jesus Christ?

nodes.title: How to Strengthen Your Devotional Life During this COVID-19 Crisis
COVID-19 Update with Dr. Roger Seheult
nodes.description: Dr. Seheult, a critical care pulmonologist, shares the latest details on the COVID-19 outbreak and also some practical things Seventh-day Adventists are uniquely positioned to do in the midst of this crisis. Dr. Seheult has also been sharing extensive updates all throughout this outbreak via his MedCram YouTube channel.
